channel.title: Windows on DUAN DAHAI
channel.description: Recent content in Windows on DUAN DAHAI

item.title: Scp files from windowsOS to linuxOS
item.description: When we want to scp files from Windows to linux in our application,and there is a limit to install a software,we can use the WinSCP Command-line in Windows command prompt. WinSCP Command-line have two modes (Console/scripting mode), I listed the console mode basic sample below. 1 C:짜winscp짜winscp.com /command "option batch on" "option confirm off" "open sftp://[scp user]:[scp password]@[scp to ipaddress]" "put C:짜test짜test01.txt" "/temp/" "option transfer binary" "close" "exit" Reference We can also use any other options in WinSCP Command-line Options.
